title: How to fix ARAM from being full of dodgers
body:
Getting pretty sick of sitting in a Queue for 5 minutes, then being in an ARAM lobby where someone leaves with 2 seconds until game starts. This can happen multiple times, i think my record is 7 lobby dodges in a row, it took about 30 minutes to get into a game.

My idea is that if you dodge at ARAM champ select, the next time you come to that lobby you are automatically assigned that same champion. I assume 90% of the cases of people leaving after accepting a game lobby invite is that they dont want to play the champion they were assigned and have no rolls.

The only problem here would be if more than 1 person dodged from different lobby with the same champion, but then they both join the same new lobby - I guess it would just pick one of them and the other would be lucky. Seems that would be pretty rare though.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
Respond to the post how you want to, but I disagree that it "wont stop anything".

Even if it stopped 1% of queue dodgers it would be an improvement that I would welcome.
I think this is a good idea, i think that everyone should keep the same champs if someone dodges, so many times i have got azir or karthus or another of my favourite champs and then someone dodged.

The problem that exists with this idea is a problem though.

Let's say i dodge with urgot (i don't dodge ARAM's but work with me) and someone else in the same lobby also dodged their last game with Urgot, now the lobby is broken cause 2 people have urgot.
this problem was already mentioned and solved in the original post

Yeah dude that's called an edit.

Which i also might add encourages dodging on low popularity champs that a higher percentage would dodge with (higher chance you'd get rid of the champion)

well that edit was there before i made my post, so whats your point?
and its more for the other people who didn't dodge, they can keep the champs they previously got instead of losing one they want.

Yeah and the edit was made after my post.

Also i read it as "Only the dodger keeps the same champion"

If that's not the case, then it's like tons more likely that people will get into lobby's with the same champion, and then this entire system becomes pointless.

I was the 3rd person to post on this thread, and neither of the other two were you and that 'Edit' was there before i posted 
so i think you have that wrong.

if you read the original post then you would be correct in reading it that way, however if you read my first post, its different, I'm introducing a new idea.

there are way over 100 champs, the chance that 2 or more out of 5 people will have the same one is fairly low, and if it does happen, then it will just be like doesit says and the system will randomly choose one of them.

all you have done is put down his idea yet you haven't produced any of your own?

*bzzt*

There may be over 100 champs, but we have the problem of two things

People with lower amounts of champs tend to have the same champs (IE. low IP cost/FoTM)

Free week champs always spawn more often, due to EVERYONE having access to them.

Personally i think the idea isn't good, and i don't think an idea is required
